title: 'It is all about raising the profile of carers'
description: The UK economy cannot afford to have more of its 10.5m army of carers quit the workforce for good.

title: England v New Zealand: The five factors behind Kiwis' Test transformation
description: There are five major factors behind New Zealand remarkable rise in the world of Test cricket. England have been paying attention.

title: Covid-19 in China: Shanghai getting used to 'new normal'
description: The city had been in lockdown for two months as China imposed its "zero Covid" policy on the population of 25m.

title: Life at 50C: Qatar accused of under-reporting deaths in Gulf's killer heat
description: A BBC Arabic investigation uncovers allegations that Qatar is underreporting the number of migrant workers who have died of heat stroke.

title: Ros Atkins On... Saudi Arabia’s $2 billion golf series
description: Ros Atkins looks at the controversy surrounding the new Saudi-funded golf tournament.

title: Is Russia exporting grain from Ukraine?
description: Much Ukrainian grain is stuck in silos, while Russia reportedly ships some cargoes from Crimea.

title: Ice cream man freezes lolly sales over costs
description: Mark Biggs of Biggzy's Ice Cream says some weeks he does not make any money due to rising bills

title: Unions branded selfish by No 10 over June rail strike plans
description: The RMT hit back at the comments saying No 10 were "experts at being selfish and irresponsible".

title: Andrew Gale wins claim of unfair dismissal against Yorkshire following Azeem Rafiq racism scandal
description: Former head coach Andrew Gale wins a claim for unfair dismissal against Yorkshire.

title: Derby County: Chris Kirchner's takeover of financially-stricken club expected to collapse
description: Chris Kirchner's attempt to buy financially-stricken club Derby County is expected to collapse, reports BBC Radio Derby.

title: PM under pressure to cut taxes after confidence vote
description: But a No 10 source says tax cuts are planned only in "the longer term", with other issues taking priority.

title: Cineworld cancels The Lady of Heaven film screenings after protests
description: The Lady of Heaven film has been criticised by some Muslim groups as blasphemous.

title: Geologist Jim Fitton jailed in Iraq: 'I just want my dad home', say family
description: Jim Fitton's family appeal to the Foreign Office after he is sentenced to 15 years in prison.

title: Community pharmacists speak out against rise in abuse and attacks
description: Staff say physical and verbal abuse is unacceptably common, and many now feel unsafe at work.

title: Dom Phillips: Missing journalist's wife in tearful plea to step up search
description: Two days after Dom Phillips disappeared, his wife appeals to Brazil to locate "the love of my life".

title: Falklands War: The bombing of the Sir Galahad
description: Survivors and bereaved families remember the biggest loss of life in the Falklands War, 40 years on.

title: North Korea could carry out nuclear tests 'any time', warns US official
description: His comments come as Pyongyang tested eight missiles on Sunday - the highest daily record so far.

title: The Papers: 'Tory MPs plan vote strikes' and 'rail shutdown'
description: Rebel plans to paralyse the government and a rail workers' vote for industrial action lead the papers.

title: Uvalde mass shooting: Wounded teacher condemns police as cowards
description: Arnulfo Reyes lost 11 of his students in the gun attack on a primary school in Uvalde, Texas.

title: Antarctica: Southern Ocean floor mapped in greatest ever detail
description: A new map traces the shape of the remote ocean bed surrounding Antarctica.
